comment.body: Individualism=Individual slaves.   The powers that be fear nothing more than the people getting too organized and teaming up.  I feel sorry for single moms...
Aww come on,  it's not that bad.
@pyra: I'm not a collectivist, That group is for women.  I'm as lone wolf as it gets.

All sounds very dramatic....   And I still don't care to watch it ;p
Just a bunch of goofs running around being goofs... Nothing new.  All the drama surrounding this doc should fetch a few views. After all, It is election year yet again with no suitable candidates,  just more drama.  Same story... Different year.
